ygData.subject: RE: Crafted Greaves
ygData.msgSnippet: Dunno if it is the correct circlet, but if it is NO DROP then it isn;t worth a copper.  Unless you know a reliable way to transfer no drops.  If you do, feel
ygData.messageBody:
Dunno if it is the correct circlet, but if it is NO DROP then it isn;t worth
a copper. Unless you know a reliable way to transfer no drops. If you do,
feel free to share =P

> -----Original Message-----
> From: Whitcraft,David [SMTP:DWHITCRAFT@...]
> Sent: Friday, September 10, 1999 9:42 AM
> To: 'EQCheats@onelist.com'
> Subject: [EQCheats] Crafted Greaves
>
> From: "Whitcraft,David" <DWHITCRAFT@...>
>
> Who has actually DONE the Crafted Greaves quest? I've heard different
> stories on what item you need. Some say the Silver Circlet off Drelzna,
> some
> say a circlet off Najena, and some say one off Trazdon.
>
> I killed Trazdon in Najena last night at got a Dark Circlet (LORE NO DROP
> MAGIC ITEM) Necro Only, AC 4, -2 CHA, +4 INT. Is this the correct item
> (please only if you have 1st hand knowledge...) It could be a Circlet from
> any of them could work....but I dont' wanna take the chance as there is a
> couple hours of work (plus two deaths...growl...I hadden't died in 6 ot 7
> levels) and 140pp in rubies at stake...heh.
>
> And if this ISN'T the correct circlet, what's this head peice worth?
> *chuckle*
> Thanks.
>
